Attributes.description: A design project engaged with an international context and site. Emphasis placed on mapping, interpretation of the international context as well as methods of construction, notions of program, and policies, regulations and codes that relate to the site.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: A score of 60% or higher in DES 401.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Thu, Start Time: 13:30, End Time: 17:00
